channel.title: Need big help! will ++ rep
channel.description: I have a client and a source + a cache but i dont know how to make it so people can get on it with me etc.. plus when i do everything and i get on the client im never owner of it :( please help!

item.title: Need big help! will ++ rep
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

If its a delta base…
To make yourself owner go into your source find the file characters…open up your account and change player rights to 3.

If its a PI base…
To make yourself owner go into your source open up Data>Characters then find your account and change player rights to 3.

To make people connect to your server you must portforward. If you have not done so there are many tutorials out there on how to. Or go to Portforward.com

(How to connect after portforwarding)
To get people to connect on a delta source go into your source open up client,java and change the ip to your no-ip.
Next go into your client folder open up client.java or gui.java(I forgot which one) Then change the ips yet again…

Basically do the same thing for PI there just in differen’t files…

If you dont have a PI nor Delta base I wasted my time in typing this. Lol

Read full topic
